subMenus.name: SOUP & SALAD
subMenus.extra: AN ARRAY OF FRESHLY PREPARED SALAD ARE SERVED COMPLIMENTARY WITH ALL ENTREES.

items.title: HOUSE SALAD
items.desc: AN ARRAY OF FRESHLY PREPARED SALAD ARE SERVED,COMPLIMENTARY WITH ALL ENTREES.
items.extra: THERE IS A SHARING FEE OF $3.90 FOR THOSE WHO CHOOSE TO SHARE ENTREES.

items.title: ROASTED VEGETABLES SALAD
items.desc: MIXED GREENS, ICEBERG LETTUCE, ROASTED SWEET POTATO, ROASTED RED PEPPERS, ROASTED PORTABELLA, GREEN BEANS, ARTICHOKE HEARTS,CHERRY TOMATOES, SERVED WITH DATES BALSAMIC VINAIGRETTE.

items.title: THAI BEEF SALAD
items.desc: MIXED GREENS, ICEBERG LETTUCE, ROASTED PORTABELLA, CORN, SPROUTS,CHERRY TOMATOES, CARROTS, GREEN ONION, MINT,CILANTRO, ROASTED,PEANUTS, ROASTED SESAME SEEDS, SERVED WITH GINGER SOY VINAIGRETTE.

items.title: GRILLED CHICKEN SALAD
items.desc: MIXED GREENS, ICEBERG LETTUCE, CHERRY TOMATOES, CUCUMBER, RED ONION,GREEN BEANS, RADISH, AVOCADO, TORTILA CHIPS,SERVED WITH MUSTARD VINAIGRETTE.

items.title: POTATO BLAST
items.desc: CRISPY POTATO SKIN STUFFED WITH PULLED BBQ BEEF AND TOPPED WITH CREAMY ROASTED GARLIC MASH POTATOS.

items.title: BEEF SLIDERS
items.desc: THREE PETITE BURGERS SERVED WITH BBQ ONION RELISH AND SERVED WITH HOME MADE SPICY KETCHUP SAUCE.

items.title: GRILL TIME CIGARS
items.desc: CRISPY THIN SKINNED CIGARS, FILLED WITH DELICIOUS CHOPPED STEAK,SCALLION,&PINE NUTS,SERVED WITH A GREEN TEHINA SAUCE.

items.title: BABY LAMB SPARE RIBS
items.desc: MARINATED IN KOREAN SAUCE & GRILLED TO PERFECTION,THESE SUCCULENT RIBLETS WILL MAKE YOU BEG FOR THIRDS.

items.title: GLAZED CHICKEN DRUMMETTES
items.desc: GRILLED DRUMMETTES, MARINATED IN A SUMPTUOUS SWEET & SPICY SAUCE THAT STAYS TO THE LAST BITE.

items.title: SWEET CHILI CAULIFLOWER
items.desc: LIGHTLY DUSTED WITH OUR SPECIAL SEASONING & FRIED GOLDEN,THEN GLAZED WITH A SWEET & SPICY CHILI SAUCE.

items.title: MOROCCAN TILAPIA
items.desc: MADE FRESH DAILY, OUR TILAPIA IS MARINATED IN A MOROCCAN SAUCE, THEN GRILLED TO SERVE.A FLAVOR TO SAVOR

items.title: SALMON PROVENCAL
items.desc: BAKED SALMON, COOKED WITH TOMATOES, GARLIC,WHITE WINE, & A BLACK OLIVE SAUCE.

items.title: CRUSTED SALMON
items.desc: FRESH SALMON COATED IN GARLIC, MACADAMIA NUTS & OTHER MOUTH FILLING TASTE SEASONINGS. BAKED & SERVED W/ MANGO SALSA.

subMenus.name: KIDS MENU
subMenus.extra: ALL KIDS MENU ITEMS ARE SERVED WITH FRENCH FRIES

items.title: HAMBURGER
items.desc: BEEF MEDALLION GRILLED TO PERFECTION, SERVED WITH LETTUCE, TOMATOES, AND CARAMELIZED ONIONS.

items.title: GRILLED HOT DOG
items.desc: PLUMP JUICY GRILLED HOT DOG

items.title: CHICKEN FINGERS
items.desc: TENDER FILLET LIGHTLY BREADED THAN FRIED TO PERFECTION.

subMenus.name: GRILL ROOM
subMenus.extra: *ALL ENTREES SERVED WITH CHOICE OF TWO SIDE DISHES.STEAMED VEGETABLES, HOME STYLE MASHED POTATOES,MAJADRA JASMIN RICE, AND FRENCH FRIES.

items.title: SMOKY BBQ CHICKEN
items.desc: CHICKEN BREAST SKEWERS MARINATED WITH OLIVE OIL, MIX OF MEDITERRANEAN INDIAN SPICES AND SMOKE LIQUID.

items.title: CAJUN CHICKEN
items.desc: DARK MEAT CHICKEN MARINATED WITH OLIVE OIL, LEMON JUICE, FRESH OREGANO, FRESH PARSLEY AND CAJUN SPICES MIX.

items.title: BABY CHICKEN SKEWERS
items.desc: DARK MEAT, TENDER CHICKEN GRILLED TO PERFECTION.

items.title: CHICKEN MARSALA
items.desc: LIGHTLY DUSTED CHICKEN CUTLET SAUTEED TO PERFECTION IN RED MARSALA WINE REDUCTION AND MUSHROOMS.

items.title: MARINATED GRILLED CHICKEN BREAST
items.desc: MARINATED CHICKEN BREAST, GRILLED TO SPECIFICATION.

items.title: TORY YAKI CHICKEN (Spicy Optional)
items.desc: SAUTEED VEGETABLES, SLOWLY CARAMELIZED, IN A SWEET CLASSIC JAPANESE SAUCE.

items.title: SWEET & SPICY CHILI CHICKEN
items.desc: GRILLED CHICKEN SLOWLY CARMELIZED IN CLASSIC JAPANESE SWEET CHILI SAUCE.

items.title: SCHNITZEL
items.desc: LIGHTLY PANKO, COATING CHICKEN CUTLETS, THEN FRIED TO GOLDEN BROWN.

items.title: CHIPOTLE GLAZED RIB EYE
items.desc: MARINATED IN A LIGHT CHIPOTLE LIME SAUCE AND GRILLED TO PERFECTION.

items.title: KOREAN STEAK
items.desc: SERVED IN SOY ONION AND ROASTED GARLIC SAUCE,THIS SUCCULENT STEAK BRINGS A TASTE OF ASIA TO MIAMI.

items.title: GAZA STRIP STEAK
items.desc: A DELICATELY PREPARED MASTERPIECE, MARINATED IN RICH JUICES,AND SIZZLED TO A THICK TENDERNESS. OUR STRIP STEAK PERSONIFIES THE WORDS `GREAT STEAK`, IT IS SERVED WITH A SIDE OF CHIMICHURRY.

items.title: KALBI PEPPER STEAK
items.desc: MADE FROM THE MOST TENDER RIB MEAT, THE KALBI STEAK ENTAILS A TASTE THAT EXCEEDS WORDS. IT IS SLOWLY GRILLED, SLICED, AND GLAZED IN RED WINE REDUCTION TOPPED WITH PEPPERCORN SAUCE, AND SERVED WITH OUR BEER BATTERED ONION BREAD.

items.title: RIB EYE STEAK
items.desc: AGED TO PERFECTION, AND GRILLED TO YOUR TASTE.ABSOLUTELY SUBLIME

items.title: BEEF FILLET SKEWERS
items.desc: MADE FROM THE MOST LEAN AND TENDER BEEF CUT.

items.title: GROUND BEEF KABAB
items.desc: GROUND BEEF, ONION, PARSLEY, AND A BIT OF MEDITERANEAN SPICES SPICES MAKE THIS DISH SIMPLY DELICIOUS.

items.title: BANANA BREAD PUDDING
items.desc: A SIMPLE DELICIOUS BAKED DESSERT MADE WITH CUBES OF BREAD SATURATED WITH A MIXTURE OF NON DAIRY CREAM, EGGS, SUGAR, VANILLA, BANANA AND SPICES SERVED WITH ROASTED WALNUTS, HOT CHOCOLATE GANACHE AND SABAYON CREAM.

items.title: CHOCOLATE SOUFFLE/VOLCANO (FOR 4)
items.desc: SOFT WARM CAKE, SURROUNDING SINFULLY RICH CHOCOLATE FILLING, ADORNED BY POWDERY SUGAR, AND SWEET WHIPPED CREAM, THIS DELIGHT IS SURELY WORTH INDULGING IN.`DEATH BY CHOCOLATE`

items.title: APPLE TART
items.desc: A SLICED APPLE, COOKED WITH CINNAMON AND BROWN SUGAR, THEN BAKED IN A PASTRY CRUST, SERVED WARM WITH WHIPPED CREAM.

items.title: COKE / DIET COKE / SPRITE / DIET SPRITE / FANTA / WATER / ICE TEA

subMenus.name: LUNCH SPECIALS
subMenus.exta: Monday thru Friday . From Noon till 4:30 PM

items.title: SALADS & APPETIZER
items.desc: SELECTION OF 5 FRESHLY PREPARED ETHNIC SALADS SERVED W/ PITA BREAD.CHOICE OF APPETIZER:GLAZED CHICKEN DRUMMETTES, SWEET CHILI CAULIFLOWER, CIGARS, FALAFEL OR HUMMUS MUSHROOMS.

items.title: SOUP & ENTRÉE SIZE SALAD
items.desc: CHOICE OF SOUP.CHOICE OF MAIN COURSE SALAD: GRILLED CHICKEN SALAD, THAI BEEF SALAD, ROASTED VEGETABLE SALAD.

items.title: FISH & SALAD
items.desc: SELECTION OF 5 FRESHLY PREPARED ETHNIC SALADS SERVED W/ PITA BREAD.CHOICE OF LUNCH PORTION FISH:MOROCCAN STYLE TILAPIA OR LEMON GARLIC & HERBS TILAPIA.CHOICE OF ISRAELI OR HOUSE SALAD.

items.title: STEAK & SALAD
items.desc: SELECTION OF 5 FRESHLY PREPARED ETHNIC SALADS SERVED W/ PITA BREAD.CHOICE OF STEAK: RIB EYE OR GAZA STRIP.CHOICE OF ISRAELI OR HOUSE SALAD.

items.title: SALADS SOUP AND ENTREE
items.desc: SELECTION OF 5 FRESHLY PREPARED ETHNIC SALADS SERVED W/ PITA BREAD.CHOICE OF SOUP. CHOICE OF ENTRÉE:BABY CHICKEN SKEWERS, TORY YAKI, CHICKEN MARSALA, SMOKEY CHICKEN, CHIPOTLE GLAZED ROASTED LEG QUARTER, GROUND BEEF KABAB OR SCHNITZEL. SERVED WITH ONE CHOICE OF SIDE ORDER.
